metadata.title: CVE-2023-47994 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability in LoadPixelDataRLE4 function inPluginBMP.cpp in Freeimage 3.18.0 allows attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation, cause a denial of service and/or run arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
